39.heading: Corteggiani, François, 1953-
39.title: Trois Hommes pour Atlanta
39.author: scénario, François Corteggiani ; illustrations, Colin Wilson ; couleurs, Janet Gale.
notes: (La Jeunesse de Blueberry ; 8)

"Blueberry s'est évadé de la prison de Rome, en Géorgie, à bord d'un train sudiste. Ce coup d'éclat lui vaut d'être placé sous les ordres du général Sherman, qui vient d'entreprendre sa marche vers la mer, afin de couper en deux un Sud déjà moribond. Blueberry est envoyé à Atlanta, comme éclaireur, pour évaluer l'importance des fortifications de la ville, mais des ombres venues de son proche passé, l'attendent...."
Set during the U.S. Civil War.

88.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
88.title: "Accidente"
88.author: [No author]
88.series: Condorito) p. 13 in Condorito Gigante, no. 550
notes: Pepe Cortisona, the driver in a car accident, will never embrace his passenger again, not because the passenger is dead but because the driver has lost both arms. Condorito is the doctor, and they are in the Pelotillehue Hospital.

89.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
89.title: "Ángeles"
89.author: [No author]
89.series: Condorito) p. 38 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: Costal de Plomo asks Condorito the priest if everybody is naked in heaven, since how will they their shirts on over their wings. Father Condorito replies that he should be more worried about how his tail will get through his pants.

90.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
90.title: "Charlatán"
90.author: [No author]
90.series: Condorito) p. 54 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: 3 tiers. Pepe Cortisona is selling a miracle medicine, and says he's never had any complaints.

91.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
91.title: "Conquistador"
91.author: [No author]
91.series: Condorito) p. 30 in Condorito de Oro, no. 74
notes: 2 tiers. Costal de Plomo wishes he could order champagne to impress his date tonight, but she's almost out of money.

92.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
92.title: "Dietéticas"
92.author: [No author]
92.series: Condorito) p. 37 in Condorito de Oro, no. 74
notes: 3 tiers. Pepe (El Saco de Plomo) ruins Condorito's business by selling low calorie sandwiches on the beach.

93.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
93.title: "Eco"
93.author: [No author]
93.series: Condorito) p. 72 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: Condorito is the guide for Pepe Cortisona's mountain hike, and he recommends trying the echo.

94.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
94.title: "La Estancia"
94.author: [No author]
94.series: Condorito) p. 73 in Condorito de Oro, no. 74
notes: Costal de Plomo brags that his farm is so big he can't drive his car around it in a day, and Condorito says he had a car like that once too.

95.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
95.title: "Experiencias Amorosas"
95.author: [No author]
95.series: Condorito) p. 9 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: 1 tier. Pepe says Condorito would be amazed to hear the conquests he's made.

96.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
96.title: "Frescura"
96.author: [No author]
96.series: Condorito) p. 31 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: 2 tiers. Condorito came to visit for a day, and after a month Pepe Cortisona wants him out.

97.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
97.title: "Gato"
97.author: [No author]
97.series: Condorito) p. 7 in Condorito Gigante, no. 550
notes: Sad waiter Condorito brings the shrimp soup to Costal de Plomo, who enjoys it, then asks why Condorito is so glum. It's because his cat died, drowned in the shrimp soup.

98.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
98.title: "Hospitalidad"
98.author: [No author]
98.series: Condorito) p. 37 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: Pepe Cortisona needs a place to stay and Condorito says he can sleep with the overseer. That goes okay but the next morning Pepe remarks that the overseer has very cold feet, and Condorito says he's been trying to get the funeral home to come and get him for three days.

99.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
99.title: "Nunca"
99.author: [No author]
99.series: Condorito) p. 51 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: 2 tiers. Pepe wants to be in the cavalry, but has never ridden, so Condorito gives him a horse that has never been ridden.

100.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
100.title: "Picadillo"
100.author: [No author]
100.series: Condorito) p. 66 in Condorito de Oro, no. 74
notes: 3 tiers. Condorito has had a fight with Pepe Cortisona ("Costal de Plomo"). Condorito is banged up, but he's carrying Pepe in his valise.

101.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
101.title: "Puchero"
101.author: [No author]
101.series: Condorito) p. 41 in Condorito Gigante, no. 550
notes: The waiter (Cortisona) reommends a stew, and afterwards asks how he found the meat. "With difficulty," Condorito responds.

102.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
102.title: "Samaritano"
102.author: [No author]
102.series: Condorito) p. 2 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: 2 tiers. Pepe Cortisona thinks it would be wrong not to marry a woman just because she has money.

103.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
103.title: "Sincero"
103.author: [No author]
103.series: Condorito) p. 38 in Condorito de Oro, no. 74
notes: 3 tiers. Pepe has a frank talk with Condorito, the boss, and gets fired.

104.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
104.title: "Tallarines"
104.author: [No author]
104.series: Condorito) p. 19 in Condorito de Oro, no. 75
notes: Condorito goes to a restaurant where Costal de Plomo is a waiter, and complains about the spelling on the menu.

105.heading: Cortisona, Pepe.
105.title: "Visita"

170.title: Corto Maltese en Siberie ; chapt. 1 "Les Lanternes Rouges"
170.author: Hugo Pratt

171.heading: Corto Maltese en Siberie ; chapt. 2.
171.title: "Les Prisonniers de Chang"
171.author: Hugo Pratt
notes: Introduction: "Il suffit que Raspoutine apparaisse, comme par miracle, devant Corto Maltese pour que les fils du mystère s'entremêlent. En cette fin d'année 1918, une intéressante information court les ruelles du port de Hong Kong: un train blindé, chargé du trésor impérial russe, sillonee la Sibérie, à la frontière mongole. A sa recherche s'acharnent les seigneurs de la guerre chinoise, les bandits mandchous, les troupes alliées et touts les sociétés secrètes chinoises. L'une de ces dernières, les Lanternes rouges, vient de passer contrat avec Corto Maltese pour retrouver le 'train d'or de l'amiral Kolchac'."
"A suivre."

172.title: Corto Maltese en Siberie ; chapt. 3 "Une Duchesse Romantique"
172.author: Hugo Pratt
notes: Chapter introduction: "Hong Kong, 1918. Corto Maltese se serait-il définitivement abandonné à son étrange torpeur s'il n'avait décidé de partir à la recherche du train blindé d l'amiral Kolchak? Un train mythique dont rêvent de s'emparer bien des aventuriers de tout bord. Car si la guerre mondiale vient de s'achever en Europe, elle se poursuit en Extrême Orient. Une rencontre fortuite avec son vieil ennemi de toujours, Raspoutine vient de se terminer tragiquement par l'incendie d'une jonque. Mais les compagnons de route ne manquent pas à Corto Maltese sur cette dangereuse piste de l'or, parsemée de traquenards."
"A suivre."

173.title: Corto Maltese en Siberie ; chapt. 4 "La Division Sauvage"
173.author: Hugo Pratt
notes: "Sur la voie ferrée transsibérienne, un puissant train blindé serpente. A son bord, en compagnie de Corto Maltese, la belle duchesse Marina Seminova va retrouver le général cosaque Semenoff. En cette fin d'année 1918, Semenoff vient de fonder avec le baron Ungern Sternberg, le gouvernement provisoire de Transbaïkalie. Sie le réve du 'baron fou' est de fonder un empire asiatique pour partir à la reconquête de l'Occident et libérer la Russie du pouvoir des bolchéviques, le rêve de tous est de s'emparer du train de l'amiral Kolchak, chargé du trésor impérial russe. Aux limites de la frontière sibérienne, tous vont s'affronter dans un combat sans merci."
"A suivre."

174.title: Corto Maltese en Siberie ; chapt. 5 "Ungern Khan"
174.author: Hugo Pratt
notes: "Aux confins de la frontière mongole, deus puissants trains blindés s'affrontent. A bord de celui du général Semenoff, commandant de la division sauvage, ont trouvé place Corto Maltese et Raspoutine. Leur but à tous: s'emparer du train de l'amiral Kolchak chargé du trésor impérial russe que convoitent seigneurs de la guerre, sociétés secrètes chinoises, et autres puissances de tout bord. Dans ce farouche affrontement, les alliances se font et se défont et l'odeur de la poudre semble griser les têtes les plus froides. Pourtant la mort rôde et la duchesse Seminova paiera de sa vie ce combat pour l'or russe."
"A suivre."
